CustomField.formula: IF( (ISPICKVAL( Day_1_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Day_1_Role__c, "Invited Member") || ISPICKVAL( Day_2_Role__c, "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Day_2_Role__c, "Invited Member") || ISPICKVAL( Dinner_Role__c , "Member") || ISPICKVAL( Dinner_Role__c, "Invited Member")), true, false)
CustomField.label: Attended - NGL Revenue Recognition
